::Perndabot::

Perndabot looks back at BrightBlade as he walks, in time to see her walking 
with her arms above her head. His eyes slide downward as her hands drop back 
to her sides.

"You must have good br-" he shuts his mouth. What was he saying?! He jerks 
his eyes back to BrightBlade's face.

"I mean your equipment, it mu-"

Not looking in front of him, Perndabot crashes into a tree, the huge bot's 
momentum carrying him through the tree's trunk, the tree falling sideways. He 
stops as branches brush his face, and looks down at the stump.

"Your equipment must be pretty advanced. Its a long way across the grassland, 
with no cover. Not to metion their base probably being on alert," he says, 
finally getting his comment right.
